titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: The Eastern States Archeological Federation (ESAF) is an organization of state archeological societies that are found in the eastern United States. ESAF was organized in 1933/34 to provide an exchange of archeological information among archeologists and state archeological societies. With a membership of 15 state societies and over 500 individual memberships, ESAF continues to be a national organization that fosters cooperation and information exchange among all people working in archeology as well as supporting public participation in all archeological activities.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of the Eastern States Archeological Federation. Materials include: correspondence, schedules, meeting announcements, programs and abstracts kept by the Recording Secretary 1980-2000; directories, 1936-1980; constitution, 1938; Bulletins, 1941-2006; financial records and accounts, 1987-1996; and cassette tapes of meetings. The collection also includes records related to the Middle Atlantic Archeological Conference (1978-1999), including planning correspondence, lists of attendees, and audiocassettes of meetings.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: University of Delaware: Archaeological Society of Delaware records.
